gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.Api

Class LvgHelp

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.Api.LvgHelp

  • public class LvgHelp
extends java.lang.Object
    This class prints out all help menu for LVG command line syntax.

    This class should be modified to become file driven in the future (TBD).

    History:

    • SCR-15, chlu, 07-23-12, add derivation type options
    • SCR-20, chlu, 07-23-12, add derivtion negation options
    Version:
    V-2013
    Author:
    NLM NLS Development Team

    • Method Detail

      • LvgHelp

        public static void LvgHelp(java.io.BufferedWriter bw,
                           boolean fileOutput)
        Print out Lvg system help menu.

        The option flags and command executions are defined in the classes of Flow and LvgCmdApi, respectively.

        Parameters:
        bw - buffer writer for Stdout or file out
        fileOutput - a flag to indicate if the bw is a file output
        See Also:
        Flow, LvgCmdApi, Design Document

      • OutputFieldHelp

        public static void OutputFieldHelp(java.io.BufferedWriter bw,
                                   boolean fileOutput)
        Print out the Lvg output fields help menu. The format of Lvg outputs are: in term | out term | categories | inflections | flow history | flow number | additional mutation information |

      • FlowHelp

        public static void FlowHelp(java.io.BufferedWriter bw,
                            boolean fileOutput)
        Print out the help menu of Lvg flow components.
        See Also:
        Design Document
